projects.title: BrutusMaps
projects.description: A full stack web application mapping out all classrooms on Ohio State's main campus. Allows users to easily visualize classroom locations, classroom availability, and information about classes and instructors.

projects.title: Non-LPR Car Identification Algorithm
projects.description: Funded capstone project under CampusParc. A script that utilizes machine-learning detection and classification image recognition models to identify cars.

projects.title: BrutusForce
projects.description: API scraper library for classes, classrooms, buildings, libraries, and instructors for Ohio State's main campus.

projects.title: Temperature-Reading and Voltage-Ramping Microcontroller
projects.description: Project for Embedded Programming course. A microcontroller capable of sensing environmental temperature, and amplifying an input signal by a specified degree.

projects.title: BugsWorld Programming Language
projects.description: Project for Data Structures & Algorithms course. A custom programming language for a game called BugsWorld.
